directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Butter or spray one 2 quart casserole dish.
Prepare stuffing according to directions on box; place stuffing in a large bowl.
Add the dried bread, eggs and water; mix well and place in casserole dish.
ingredients: 10 slices day-old bread, torn into small pieces
title: Easy Stuffing
